rules.natural: If the EPA approves the climate bill, then climate action is implemented at the national level.
Either climate scientists reach scientific consensus, or whenever the federal government launches the carbon market, the federal government implements the carbon tax.
If the compliance deadline is 2025, then corporations are subject to a penalty system.
Either the compliance deadline is 2025 or the EPA establishes an enforcement mechanism.

Should the EPA establish an enforcement mechanism, then whenever a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, it implies that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

Provided that corporations are subject to a penalty system, then under the condition that a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, green jobs creation occurs in the economy.
Whenever environmental groups engage in public protest, it is not the case that environmental groups provide public support.
Should major economies form bilateral agreements, then the State Department undertakes diplomatic efforts.
Either major economies form bilateral agreements or a UN climate summit hosts multilateral negotiations.

If a UN climate summit hosts multilateral negotiations, then under the condition that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement, developed countries engage in technology transfer.
If an industry association initiates a legal challenge, then the Supreme Court issues a court ruling.

Should it not be the case that if Congress faces political pressure, then either fossil fuel companies conduct industry lobbying or if environmental groups engage in public protest, environmental groups provide public support, then an industry association initiates a legal challenge.
If climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to emission targets being set for 2030, then the federal government launches the carbon market.
Provided that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to emission targets being set for 2030, it is not the case that the federal government implements the carbon tax.

Whenever climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector not occurring, it is not the case that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

If climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement not occurring, it is not the case that developed countries engage in technology transfer.
Should it not be the case that the EPA approves the climate bill, then environmental groups engage in public protest.
Whenever it is not the case that climate action is implemented at the national level, then the private sector makes renewable investment.
If climate action is not implemented at the national level, then an international UN agreement fosters cooperation.

facts.natural: A satellite network deploys the monitoring system.
It is not the case that climate scientists reach scientific consensus.
The State Department does not undertake diplomatic efforts.
Fossil fuel companies do not conduct industry lobbying.
The Supreme Court does not issue a court ruling.
Emission targets are not set for 2030.

target.natural: Climate action is implemented at the national level.

Provided that Congress faces political pressure, then either fossil fuel companies conduct industry lobbying, or whenever environmental groups engage in public protest, environmental groups provide public support.

If environmental groups engage in public protest, then environmental groups provide public support.
Environmental groups do not engage in public protest.
The EPA approves the climate bill.
Climate action is implemented at the national level.
Provided that the federal government launches the carbon market, the federal government implements the carbon tax.
Under the condition that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to emission targets being set for 2030, the federal government implements the carbon tax.
Provided that climate action is not implemented at the national level, emission targets are set for 2030.
Climate action is implemented at the national level.

Whenever the compliance deadline is 2025, then if a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and given that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, it follows that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

Under the condition that a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, then the economy experiences green jobs creation.
If climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector not occurring, then the economy experiences green jobs creation.
Under the condition that climate action is not implemented at the national level, it is not the case that the private sector makes renewable investment.
Climate action is implemented at the national level.

Either the State Department undertakes diplomatic efforts, or if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement, then developed countries engage in technology transfer.

Under the condition that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement not occurring, then developed countries engage in technology transfer.
Should climate action not be implemented at the national level, then it is not the case that an international UN agreement fosters cooperation.
Climate action is implemented at the national level.

(A1 → G).natural: If the EPA approves the climate bill, then climate action is implemented at the national level.

(A10 → A9).natural: Provided that the federal government launches the carbon market, the federal government implements the carbon tax.

(A11 ∨ (A10 → A9)).natural: Either climate scientists reach scientific consensus, or whenever the federal government launches the carbon market, the federal government implements the carbon tax.

(A14 → (¬(¬G → ¬A12) → A13)).natural: Under the condition that a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, then the economy experiences green jobs creation.

(A15 → (A14 → (¬(¬G → ¬A12) → A13))).natural: Whenever the compliance deadline is 2025, then if a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and given that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, it follows that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

(A15 → A17).natural: If the compliance deadline is 2025, then corporations are subject to a penalty system.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either the compliance deadline is 2025 or the EPA establishes an enforcement mechanism.

(A16 → (A14 → (¬(¬G → ¬A12) → A13))).natural: Should the EPA establish an enforcement mechanism, then whenever a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, it implies that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

(A17 → (A14 → (¬(¬G → ¬A12) → A13))).natural: Provided that corporations are subject to a penalty system, then under the condition that a satellite network deploys the monitoring system, and if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector, green jobs creation occurs in the economy.

(A2 → A3).natural: If environmental groups engage in public protest, then environmental groups provide public support.

(A2 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever environmental groups engage in public protest, it is not the case that environmental groups provide public support.

(A20 ∨ (¬(¬G → ¬A18) → A19)).natural: Either the State Department undertakes diplomatic efforts, or if climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement, then developed countries engage in technology transfer.

(A21 → A20).natural: Should major economies form bilateral agreements, then the State Department undertakes diplomatic efforts.

(A21 ∨ A22).natural: Either major economies form bilateral agreements or a UN climate summit hosts multilateral negotiations.

(A22 → (¬(¬G → ¬A18) → A19)).natural: If a UN climate summit hosts multilateral negotiations, then under the condition that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement, developed countries engage in technology transfer.

(A4 ∨ (A2 → A3)).natural: Either fossil fuel companies conduct industry lobbying, or if environmental groups engage in public protest, then environmental groups provide public support.

(A5 → (A4 ∨ (A2 → A3))).natural: Provided that Congress faces political pressure, then either fossil fuel companies conduct industry lobbying, or whenever environmental groups engage in public protest, environmental groups provide public support.

(A6 → A7).natural: If an industry association initiates a legal challenge, then the Supreme Court issues a court ruling.

(¬(A5 → (A4 ∨ (A2 → A3))) → A6).natural: Should it not be the case that if Congress faces political pressure, then either fossil fuel companies conduct industry lobbying or if environmental groups engage in public protest, environmental groups provide public support, then an industry association initiates a legal challenge.

(¬(¬G → A8) → A10).natural: If climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to emission targets being set for 2030, then the federal government launches the carbon market.

(¬(¬G → ¬A12) → A13).natural: If climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector not occurring, then the economy experiences green jobs creation.

(¬(¬G → ¬A12) → ¬A13).natural: Whenever climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to renewable investment by the private sector not occurring, it is not the case that the economy experiences green jobs creation.

(¬(¬G → ¬A18) → A19).natural: Under the condition that climate action is implemented at the national level necessarily leads to international cooperation under a UN agreement not occurring, then developed countries engage in technology transfer.
